title: Elizabeth's Headache
story: Ms. Thomas. I'm not feeling well. What is it, Elizabeth? My head hurts. You may have a headache. Yes, I think I do. Let's go see the school nurse. Okay, Ms. Thomas. I'll be back in class. Try to be quiet.
summary: Elizabeth complains of a headache and goes to the school nurse with the help of her teacher, Ms. Thomas.
image: Illustration of Elizabeth and Ms. Thomas in the school hallway
